transcripts.text: Now, we live in a time where I hear from people frequently the statement, no creed but Christ's.  When you said no creed but Christ, you really didn't take the time to think about it because even the statement no creed but Christ is a creed.  If we don't like doctrine, then really we don't like truth.  And if we don't like truth, then we don't like the Word of God.  The Westminster Confession of Faith sets forth the most comprehensive and most precise confession of faith that was ever produced in the history of the church.  Ooooooooh.
